Text.Page:
No one's sure why the arachnens are working alongside the nagas, but it's a deadly combination. My advice is to kill them all, but I'd start with the {@LinkCreature:10#1#arachnen warriors}.

Let's keep it simple. You kill them and I'll pay you.
Clearly the arachnens aren't the only predators around. You're one to watch!
Certainly the {@LinkCreature:10#1#arachnen warrior} is dangerous, but think of the gold!
